content: pattern l60250 skirt is worked in one piece in joined and turned rounds from top down the drawstring makes the waist measurement adjustable finished waist 32 / 81 5cm - adjustable finished length 34 / 86 5cm lion brand mandala art #525 590yrds/539m 5 25oz/150g 217 genie 1 ball a 208 valkyrie 1 ball b 206 serpent 1 ball c crochet hook size g-6 4 25 mm gauge 1½ chevrons x 7 row = 4 /10cm over chevron pattern of row 1 and 2 and measuring straight across from peak to peak 15 single_crochet = 4 / 10 cm
